title: How Long T'ill Ranked Queues Are Up
body: Just wondering if any Rioter could somewhat clarify how long we must wait until the queues are back up and running.

replies.body: How long will the queues be disabled in North America?

Ranked queues on  NA are back up now.  Just be aware that there will be another maintenance coming up where League will be unavailable for roughly five hours.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay updated on that!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eiy8N11j,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-09T20:19:58.597+0000)
>
> Ranked queues on  NA are back up now.  Just be aware that there will be another maintenance coming up where League will be unavailable for roughly five hours.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay updated on that!

thank you
